sections.heading: Integrity
sections.content: We uphold honesty and transparency in all financial interactions. Employees must disclose conflicts of interest and never manipulate data for personal benefit.

sections.heading: Privacy
sections.content: User data is treated confidentially. We only access user financial data for service operations and with explicit consent.

sections.heading: Compliance
sections.content: EaziWage follows applicable local regulations and international best practice when handling payroll and wage access services.
